name: Jump And Shoot (MoNouri)
description:
This is my first game using the Godot game engine.
I developed this game as a I was learning the basics of Godot and after adding some fun gameplay I decided to share it with everyone. any feedback is appreciated
Have Fun.

PS : I forgot to put limits to the  level so if you jump to the side and miss the lava  you'll have to restart :(
